mapper.insert: insert into registers ( register_patient_id, register_user_id, register_regdate, register_date, register_memo, register_communication, register_state) values ( #{register_patient_id}, #{register_user_id}, now(), #{register_date}, #{register_memo}, #{register_communication}, #{register_state})
mapper.select: select register_id, register_patient_id, register_user_id, register_regdate, register_date, register_starttime, register_memo, register_communication, register_state from registers

select r.register_id, r.register_patient_id, r.register_user_id, r.register_regdate, r.register_date, r.register_starttime, r.register_memo, r.register_communication, r.register_state, p.patient_name, p.patient_ssn, p.patient_sex, p.patient_tel, u.user_name from registers r, patients p, users u where str_to_date(register_date, '%Y-%m-%d')=str_to_date(#{register_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and register_patient_id=patient_id and register_user_id=user_id order by register_date asc
